com.pb.sawdust.io

Class IterableFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.io.IterableFileReader

  • public class IterableFileReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The IterableFileReader class offers static convenience methods for dealing with reading files. These mainly include methods to read a text file as a LineIterableReader instance. This class offers the convenience of reading a file, f, line-by-line using the following convenience idiom: 
         for (String line : IterableFileReader.getLineIterableFile(f)) {
         //do something with the line...
     }
    It is noted that a LineIterableReader's iterator can only be created (and iterated through) once; on the other hand, this iterator (and the object itself) is thread-safe.

    For better or for worse, this class also does away with checked IOExceptions, wrapping them instead with RuntimeIOExceptions. This reduces the up-front coding burden be eliminating the forced acknowledgement of the exception, but also can allow some recoverable exceptional conditions to percolate through to runtime. Therefore, care must be taken to note which methods can throw the RuntimeIOException, and handle this as needed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader
      The LineIterableReader is an iterable reader which is used to iterate over the lines in a file.

    • Method Detail

      • getLineIterableFile

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFile(java.io.File file)
        Factory method to get a LineIterableReader for use with a specified file. This reader can iterate over each line in the file, returning a string containing the text in the line, minus any line termations characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFile

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFile(java.io.File file,
                                                        Filter<java.lang.String> lineFilter)
        Factory method to get a filtered LineIterableReader for use with a specified file. This reader can iterate over each line in the file, skipping lines in which lineFilter(line) == false, returning a string containing the text in the line, minus any line termations characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        lineFilter - The filter to use with the line iterator.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator(java.io.File file)
        Factory method to get a LineIterableReader which reads line termination characters for use with a specified file. This reader is identical to the one returned in getLineIterableFile(java.io.File), except it does not strip away the trailing line termination characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator(java.io.File file,
                                                                          Filter<java.lang.String> lineFilter)
        Factory method to get a filtered LineIterableReader which reads line termination characters for use with a specified file. This reader is identical to the one returned in getLineIterableFile(java.io.File,Filter<String>), except it does not strip away the trailing line termination characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        lineFilter - The filter to use with the line iterator.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFile

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFile(java.io.File file,
                                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Factory method to get a LineIterableReader for use with a specified file using a specific character encoding. This reader can iterate over each line in the file, returning a string containing the text in the line, minus any line termations characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        charset - The character set encoding to use with the reader.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFile

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFile(java.io.File file,
                                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                                        Filter<java.lang.String> lineFilter)
        Factory method to get a filtered LineIterableReader for use with a specified file using a specific character encoding. This reader can iterate over each line in the file, skipping lines in which lineFilter(line) == false, returning a string containing the text in the line, minus any line termations characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        charset - The character set encoding to use with the reader.
        lineFilter - The filter to use with the line iterator.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.

      • getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator

        public static IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader getLineIterableFileWithLineTerminator(java.io.File file,
                                                                          java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Factory method to get a LineIterableReader which reads line termination characters for use with a specified file using a specific character encoding. This reader is identical to the one returned in getLineIterableFile(java.io.File,java.io.Charset), except it does not strip away the trailing line termination characters.
        Parameters:
        file - The to use the reader with.
        charset - The character set encoding to use with the reader.
        Returns:
        a line iterable reader for use with file.
        Throws:
        RuntimeIOException - if file is not found.
